name: GameDev.TV Jam 2022 - Dead zone
description:
You have enter the mysteries dead zone, try to eliminates the enemies that try to stop you. After die, you have last chance to leave  with soul states to collect all the keys to leave  this places!

Control :

WSAD to move.

left click mouse to shoot.

Credit :

16x16 Fantasy RPG Characters by Superdark

free-pixel-effects-pack-4-explosions and Free Pixel Effects Pack #15 - Magic Arrows by XYEzwar
